contentList.content:
Long ago, the boundaries between worlds began to blur. In the Forgotten Realms, an ancient power stirred—a mysterious force known as the Nexus. From this convergence of dimensions emerged legendary Heroes drawn from distant lands.

These exalted Heroes, each bearing a unique legacy and formidable abilities, come in many forms—warriors, mages, healers, and assassins.
Weapon Attacks now have a 25% chance to trigger a splash effect in a small area, dealing 1d10 Piercing damage to the primary target.
Shoots a penetrating projectile that deals damage to targets and knocks them back.
All nearby allies can use their reaction to make one weapon attack.
Regain 1d10 + level + Constitution Modifier amount of Hit Points.
The next time damage would reduce the affected entity to 0 <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit points</LSTag>, it remains conscious with Level plus Constitution Modifier hit point left.
Charge forward and attack the first enemy in your way. The target may be stunned.
Pick up an item or creature and use it to make a melee attack. The target may be stunned.
When you heal another creature, it gains resistance against Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing damage dealt by weapon attacks.
Has Resistance against Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing damage.
Release a wave of light to heal allies and damage enemies.
Heals the target and restores half of the healed amount to yourself.
When you kill a hostile creature, you gain Temporary Hit Points.
Gained <LSTag Tooltip="TemporaryHitPoints">temporary hit points</LSTag> equal to its Constitution <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag> and Level combined.

Unlock <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Zone_Raynor_PenetratingRound">Penetrating Round</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Raynor_Inspire">Inspire</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Raynor_AdrenalineRush">Adrenaline Rush</LSTag>.

Unlock <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Rush_Diablo_ShadowCharge">Shadow Charge</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Zone_Diablo_FireStomp">Fire Hands</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Throw_Diablo_Overpower">Overpower</LSTag>.

Unlock <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Uther_HolyLight">Holy Light</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Zone_Uther_HolyRadiance">Holy Radiance</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Uther_HammerOfJustice">Hammer of Justice</LSTag>.

Unlock <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_Kerrigan_Ravage">Ravage</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Kerrigan_ImpalingBlades">Impaling Blades</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Zone_Kerrigan_PrimalGrasp">Primal Grasp</LSTag>.
Summons thorns that grow from the ground, dealing damage. The target may be stunned.
Deals damage to the enemy and pulls them in.
Leap down unto a foe, knocking them <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag>.
Melee weapon attacks deal an additional 1d4 cold damage. You Have Resistance to Cold Damage.

Unlock <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_Arthas_DeathCoil">Death Coil</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_Arthas_HowlingBlast">Howling Blast</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Arthas_FrozenTempest">Frozen Tempest</LSTag>.
Deals cold damage and may freeze the target.
Emits an aura that deals cold damage to nearby enemies.
Melee Unarmed Attacks now have a 25% chance to deal 1d10 Bludgeoning damage to the target.

Unlock <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Rush_Kharazim_RadiantDash">Radiant Dash</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Kharazim_BreathOfHeaven">Breath of Heaven</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Kharazim_DeadlyReach">Deadly Reach</LSTag>.
Dash quickly to the target. Heals if the target is an ally, and deals damage if the target is an enemy.
Heal yourself and all nearby allies and increase their movement speed.
It strikes the enemy with a hammer, potentially stunning them.
It delivers a fierce four-hit combo to deal damage.
Fires a corrupted essence to deal damage.
It emits fire from your hands, dealing damage to the front.
When a melee weapon attack hits, you regain 1d4 hit points.
Charge forward and attack all enemies in your way.
While you are in an area that is Lightly or Heavily Obscured, you gain the Invisible condition against any creature.
Flings a Singularity Spike that sticks to the first enemy hit.
When you deal damage to an enemy, there is a 25% chance to restore a small amount of Hit Points.

Unlock <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_Thrall_ChainLightning">Chain Lightning</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Thrall_FeralSpirit">Feral Spirit</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Thrall_Windfury">Windfury</LSTag>.
Gain a disengange and movement speed boost. You can use a Windfury Strike, hitting with your weapon three times.
While you are in an area that is Lightly or Heavily Obscured, you gain the Invisible condition against any creature.

Unlock <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_Nova_Snipe">Snipe</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Nova_PinningShot">Pinning Shot</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Nova_HoloDecoy">Holo Decoy</LSTag>.
